Spokane.Spokane Hoopfest:
Hoopfest is an annual outdoor 3-on-3 basketball tournament held in downtown Spokane, Washington.
It is the largest event of its kind in the world, as it drew 27,876 players on 7,046 teams in 2011. It began in 1990 with 2,009 players on 512 teams, and has grown to over 6,700 participant teams.
